Wildrider walked in, holding the burnt cassette. Megatron turned around.
"How is our little Interogator?" he asked. "He's been better." Wildrider
said with a hint of amusement. "Is he functional?", "Yeah" Wildrider
repled. "Excellent." Megatron said, with a serious look on his face. He
grabbed something from a storage compartment in the side wall. "Open the
CR. Ragnus, be ready to fire if need be." Wildrider walked up to it, and
opened the CR, just as it slid open Megatron fired an energy bond at
Perceptor's body, to constrain his arms.
